basic.description: This course utilizes Matlab and a programming language (C/Fortran). The course focuses on topics such as floating point arithmetic, numerical matrix analysis, multiple regression analysis, non-linear optimization, root finding, numerical integration, Monte-Carlo sampling, and surveys of density estimation.
basic.subject: STA
basic.title: Computational Methods in Statistics I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: At least one statistics above STA 1013, some programming experience, or instructor permission.
